div.p: All SLSD buildings are closed and all activities are cancelled until further notice. Visit southwestschools.org/wellness for the latest information.
"Academic and Social growth for ALL students, EVERY DAY!"

div.p: Governor DeWine extended the closure of all Ohio schools through at least Friday, May 1. Click HERE for the latest updates from Superintendent John Hamstra. Thanks to our staff, students and parents for a great start to Remote Learning. If

Food Distribution began on March 30, 2020. All elementary schools as well as the junior school have meal bags and power packs on hand to distribute to ANY STUDENT in SLSD with a food need - not just for those on Free and Reduced. Distribution
